thread.section_title: An Roinn Airgeadais, Department of Finance
thread.title: Department's Legal Panel

author: editorfinance
title: Department's Legal Panel
text:
11.08.15 
Department of Finance Legal Panel 
A tender process for the appointment of a panel of legal advisors for the provision of legal services to the Department of Finance was completed in early 2014. General Agreements were signed by 7 suppliers on 28 April 2014 (the commencement date) who now form this new legal panel. The General Agreements continue in force for a period of three years and are subject to annual review. The members of the panel are as follows: 
â€¢ A&L Goodbody
